name: Bouncy Blight
description:
Bouncy Blight

In Bouncy Blight you control a bouncy little radioactive slime. 

Hop left and right down the platforms as you collect radioactive bottles and avoid a mad scientist who is trying to destroy you with his flamethrower. But worry not, you can protect from the fire by deep freezing yourself. When in danger, just hit the space bar to freeze. And keep an eye on your freeze meter as well as your radioactivity. Collect enough points and you'll be able to buy new freeze form from the shop. Can you get them all?

Controls

Move = Arrows or A,D

Freeze = Space

Pause = Esc
